lyric.verse: Hajimete moratta Senritsu wa Kanashimi wo Kumiawase Hieta kono te wo Atatameta no Anata gake Kitsukete iku yoo ni Torikaesanai mo no wa Akiramete mo ii no ni Kekarun da fuchi kara Tachi no boru mirai wa Surikirete konagona
lyric.chorus: Obieta futari ga Chigatzukisugita no Amari ni samishikute Kawaita oto wa Eda wo yurashinagara Saita hana wo Chirashite shimatta Shizuka ni
lyric.verse: Togireru koto wo Osoreru kara Hitasura ni Hibiku dake Toki wo tomete Umi no soko e to Mi wo nagete Sugite iku no wo matsu no Ima chiisaku mebuite Yogoreta chi wo karada wo Kubihateta yobina wo Koko kara hajimereba Nani mo motanakereba
lyric.chorus: Nejireta futari wa Modaeta bun dake Chigirete kubaride Yabureta mado ni Ano kogoeta kaze ga Sameyoseru no Hieta mama no te dake Shizuka ni Tsumetai te dake Shizuka ni Tsumetai te dake Shizuka ni
